faq.title: Pertanyaan yang Sering Diajukan (FAQ)
faq.a1: Ya, mengunduh thumbnail YouTube untuk penggunaan pribadi, inspirasi, atau tujuan pendidikan umumnya dianggap legal di bawah penggunaan wajar.
faq.q2: Bisakah saya mengunduh thumbnail dari YouTube Shorts?
faq.a2: Tentu saja! Alat kami sepenuhnya mendukung YouTube Shorts, video reguler, live stream, dan video tidak terdaftar.
faq.q3: Mengapa opsi thumbnail 4K terkadang tidak tersedia?
faq.a3: Tidak semua video YouTube memiliki thumbnail resolusi 4K. Resolusi maksimum tergantung pada kualitas video asli.
faq.q4: Apakah ini bekerja di iPhone dan Android?
faq.a4: Ya! Alat kami bekerja dengan sempurna di semua perangkat termasuk iPhone, iPad, ponsel Android, Mac, dan PC Windows.
faq.a5: Ya, Pengunduh Thumbnail YouTube kami 100% gratis tanpa biaya tersembunyi dan tanpa batasan unduhan.
faq.a6: Ukuran yang disarankan adalah 1280 × 720 piksel dengan rasio aspek 16:9 dan ukuran file di bawah 2MB.
faq.q7: Bagaimana cara mendapatkan URL video YouTube?
faq.a7: Salin URL dari bilah alamat browser Anda atau klik tombol Bagikan di bawah video.
faq.q8: Bisakah saya mengunduh thumbnail Vimeo juga?
faq.a8: Ya! Alat kami mendukung platform video YouTube dan Vimeo.
faq.q9: Apakah Anda menyimpan unduhan atau URL saya?
faq.a9: Tidak, kami tidak menyimpan thumbnail, URL, atau data pribadi apa pun di server kami.
faq.q10: Mengapa menggunakan ini daripada tangkapan layar?
faq.a10: Alat kami menyediakan gambar asli berkualitas tertinggi, seringkali dalam resolusi 4K, tidak seperti tangkapan layar yang dikompresi.

hero.title: About YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
hero.description: The <strong1>fastest and most reliable free tool</strong1> to download YouTube video thumbnails in 4K, Full HD, and SD quality. Trusted by content creators, marketers, and millions of users worldwide.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: <strong1>YouTube Thumbnail Downloader</strong1> was born out of a simple need: content creators and marketers needed a fast, reliable, and free way to download high-quality YouTube thumbnails without complicated software or registration requirements.
story.p2: As digital content continues to grow exponentially, thumbnails have become crucial for video success. They're the first thing viewers see, and a compelling thumbnail can dramatically increase click-through rates. Our <strong1>YouTube thumbnail grabber</strong1> makes it easy to:

list.l1: Study successful thumbnail designs for inspiration
list.l2: Archive your own video thumbnails for portfolio purposes
list.l3: Analyze competitor strategies in your niche
list.l4: Create reaction content or video essays (with proper attribution)
list.l5: Save thumbnails for offline reference and research

story.p3: Today, our <strong1>free YouTube thumbnail downloader</strong1> serves over half a million users every month, processing millions of thumbnail downloads while maintaining lightning-fast speeds and 100% uptime.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: Welcome to YouTube Thumbnail Downloader ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our <strong1>free YouTube thumbnail downloader</strong1> service.
intro.p2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.p1: We prioritize user privacy and collect minimal data necessary to provide our service.
collection.p2: We <strong1>DO NOT</strong1> require registration, account creation, or personal information (such as name, email address, or phone number) to use our YouTube thumbnail downloader tool.
collection.p3: Like most websites, we may automatically collect certain information when you visit our site, including:

list.l4: Time and date of your visit
list.l5: Pages visited and time spent on those pages

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.p1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.
cookies.p2: We use Google Analytics to understand how our website is being used in order to improve the user experience. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect information such as how often users visit this site, what pages they visit when they do so, and what other sites they used prior to coming to this site.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.p1: We use the collected information for various purposes:

list.l1: To provide and maintain our Service
list.l2: To monitor the usage of our Service
list.l3: To detect, prevent and address technical issues
list.l4: To improve our website and user experience

security.title: Data Security
security.content: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

ads.title: Advertising
ads.content: We may use third-party Service Providers to show advertisements to you to help support and maintain our Service. These third parties may use cookies or similar technologies to gather information about your activities on this and other websites to provide you with advertising based upon your browsing activities and interests.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13.
